variable.name: Best_Estimate_Dx
variable.description: Best estimate DSMIV diagnosis. Subjects with European Ancestry

variable.name: BE_Dx_Confidence
variable.description: Best estimate DSMIV diagnosis confidence. Subjects with European Ancestry
variable.value: Possible, some criteria met, some supporting information
Probable, all criteria met, no supporting information
Definite, meets criteria and has supporting information

variable.name: Bipolar_Subject
variable.description: Bipolar subject case or other. Subjects with European Ancestry
variable.value: Bipolar 1 or Schizoaffective disorder, bipolar type with best estimate DSMIV diagnosis confidence equal to 3 or 4

Bipolar case alternative diagnosis (Bipolar 1 or Schizoaffective disorder, bipolar type with best estimate DSMIV diagnosis confidence equal to 1 or 2, or all other diagnosis not equal to Bipolar 1 or Schizoaffective disorder, bipolar type)

variable.name: GAIN_ID
variable.description: GAIN ID. Subjects with European Ancestry
